message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase the product at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get a better deal than $18000.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to propose a price of $17000, which is a compromise between my initial offer and your counteroffer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but I'd like to propose $15500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

I'm willing to meet you at a price, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $15500. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I propose a price of $16500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
